column1: The '''White Company''' was the name of the [[Prince of Ithilien]]'s guard during the [[Fourth Age]].
It was created by King [[Aragorn|Elessar]] in {{TA|3019}} to serve the first Prince of Ithilien
column2: [[Faramir]]. The first Captain of the '''Guard of Faramir''' was [[Beregond]]
column3: in recognition of his deeds during the [[Siege of Gondor]] where he abandoned his post in order to save Faramir from his [[Denethor|insane father]].<ref>{{RK|VI5}}</ref>
